Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wentworth/61st.
ShortDescription: Northbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 61st, State, 59th, and Wentworth due to, street blockage near Wentworth/61st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Wentworth, 61st, State, 59th, and Wentworth due to, street blockage near Wentworth/61st.

 Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
